title: Yuu☆Yuu☆Hakusho Picture Drama
synopsis: Because the Demon World Tournament winner has requested it, Yusuke, Kuwabara and Kurama get together in front of an audience for each of them to record a morning and evening greeting.
related_anime: ['Yuu☆Yuu☆Hakusho: Eizou Hakusho II', 'Yuu☆Yuu☆Hakusho: Eizou Hakusho - Ankoku Bujutsukai no Shou', 'Yuu☆Yuu☆Hakusho']
